Dev Trends

Documentation 📝

news.views.index(request)[source]¶

Render the index page for logged-in users.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The rendered ‘index.html’ template.

Return type:

HttpResponse

user_auth.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]¶

Authenticate the user based on provided credentials.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object containing POST data.

Returns:

A redirect to the ‘index’ page if successful, otherwise re-renders ‘login.html’ with an error message.

Return type:

HttpResponse or HttpResponseRedirect

user_auth.views.register(request)[source]¶

Register a new user and log them in if successful.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

A redirect to the ‘index’ page if successful, otherwise re-renders ‘register.html’ with an error message.

Return type:

HttpResponse or HttpResponseRedirect

user_auth.views.show_user(request)[source]¶

Display the authenticated user’s information.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The rendered ‘user.html’ template with the user’s username and password.

Return type:

HttpResponse

user_auth.views.user_login(request)[source]¶

Render the login page.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The rendered ‘login.html’ template.

Return type:

HttpResponse

user_auth.views.user_logout(request)[source]¶

Log the user out and redirect to the login page.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

A redirect to the login page.

Return type:

HttpResponseRedirect
